resources.string: Homemade EggTart. It contains 6 piece with container provided. You can microware or bake it for 15 sec to heat. Crispy!

string.name: success
string.u: Transcation Successful!. Your cooker receive your order and prearing now. To check you status, go to \"Recent Transacttion\".

string.name: cooker_receive_order
string.u: You receive an order request . Please Look at your order that \"Recent Transacttion\"

string.name: cooker_finish_order
string.u: If you finish your order, please press Successful. Your profit is credit on "Profit" already. Thank you for using HungryStomach

string.name: buyer_notice
string.u: Don\'t forget to review your food\! Please go to \"History\" to review your pass transaction. Thank you for using HungryStomach

resources.string:
Hello, %1$s! Your order has been placed. 
 Total Price: %2$s 
 Transaction Date: %3$s
